description: Tracks Eye of Magnus instability and perturbation from siphoning or manipulation

eye_of_magnus_instability.name: Eye of Magnus Instability
eye_of_magnus_instability.description: Tracks how unstable the Eye of Magnus becomes as it is siphoned, perturbed, or otherwise disturbed.
eye_of_magnus_instability.completion_effect: At 6/6, the Eye's containment fails or an overwhelming external force intervenes, radically changing the situation.
advancement_triggers: PCs or NPCs siphon power from the Eye of Magnus
Significant perturbations, miscasts, or magical feedback near the Eye
Containment lattice is weakened, bypassed, or left unattended during a major event
setback_triggers: Power is safely vented or redirected away from the Eye
Major reinforcement or re-harmonization of the containment lattice
Powerful external stabilization, warding, or divine intervention focused on the Eye
eye_of_magnus_instability.notes:
Ticks when the Eye is siphoned/perturbed; at 6, containment fails or an external force intervenes.
[2026-02-15] Tick 1/6: initial Eye siphon via Oskern's Atronach Hunger compel (Staff of Cinders conduit); surge stabilized by Tolfdir spending 1 invoke from 'Containment Lattice Harmonized'.
